title: Pixel 3aXL Android 11 No device control in power button
content:
Just updated my Pixel3aXL to 11. I see some features are not there after the update.
1. Power button -> Device control page shows "Cat controls" (Yeah ok its an easter egg, but where can I add new devices ?)
2. The screenshot button is gone. Swipe up just opens the app drawer.
3. Discovering other missing functions .....
category: Homescreen and Launcher, Google Pixel 3a XL
